basics.name: Arieswaran
basics.label: Game Developer
basics.summary: Arieswaran is a game developer with three years of experience. He's a pro at Unity and nodejs and knows his way around AWS and GCloud. When he's not busy automating everything in sight, he loves to indulge in his love for video games. If you need a hand with anything tech-related, Arieswaran is your guy - just don't challenge him to a game of League of Legends, or you might regret it!

work.summary: Senior Game Developer for Hitwicket Superstars
highlights: Improved app stability: Reduced crashes and ANRs to improve app performance and ensure a better user experience.
Multiplayer development: Contributed to the development of multiplayer features using websockets, adding value to the game and enhancing user engagement.
Automation and efficiency: Developed and implemented tools such as Discord bots to streamline workflows and improve team productivity, resulting in greater efficiency and time savings.

Feature development and team leadership: Led the development and implementation of multiple features, coordinating with team members and ensuring successful delivery of each project. Demonstrated strong teamwork and leadership skills in managing projects and collaborating with colleagues to achieve goals.

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
